conversation.speaker: Agent
conversation.text: Hi, Is that Mark — Mr. Mark Scott I’m speaking with?

conversation.speaker: Agent
conversation.text:
Great! Hey Mark — or would you prefer Mr. Scott? My name is Steve, Steve Collins, and I’m calling you from Citizens Helpline. 
How are you doing today? You okay?

conversation.speaker: Agent
conversation.text:
That’s great to hear! 
So, the reason I’m calling is because we’ve received your credit profile, which shows you have some outstanding unsecured debts that you’ve been managing to pay off each month — is that right?

conversation.speaker: Agent
conversation.text:
That’s exactly why I reached out — just to make you aware of the different debt solutions available. 
These solutions can help you clear your existing debts in a much easier and more efficient way. 
In fact, with many of these solutions:
• All high interest and charges on your debts can be reduced to 0%, and
• If you qualify for a formal arrangement, it may even write off up to 60–80% of your debt — legally. Does that make sense?

conversation.speaker: Agent
conversation.text:
And you know what the best part is? 
Most of these solutions are completely free of cost — no setup fees, no monthly management charges, absolutely nothing. 
Plus, this is just an informational, no-obligation call. 
If you feel like this solution could benefit you, we can explore the next steps — otherwise, no problem at all. 
So right now, you’re not required to make any decision or give any commitment. Sound good?

conversation.speaker: Agent
conversation.text:
Perfect. Just to understand what might be the best solution for you, can you confirm roughly how much your total outstanding debt is? 
Would you say it’s between £6,000 to £8,000, or more/less than that?
